Uses of Class
ecs.Entity

    • Uses of Entity in ecs

      Methods in ecs that return Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Entity Engine.getEntity​(int id)
      Gets an Entity of the Engine provided its ID.
      Entity Engine.removeEntity​(int id)
      Removes an Entity from the Engine.
      Methods in ecs that return types with arguments of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Set<Entity> System.getEntities()
      Gets all the entities of the System.
      java.util.Collection<Entity> Engine.getEntitiesWithComponent​(java.lang.Class<? extends Component> compClass)
      Gets all the entities having a given Component.
      java.util.Collection<Entity> Engine.getEntitiesWithComponents​(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends Component>> compClasses)
      Gets all the entities having all the given Component.
      java.util.Iterator<Entity> System.iterator()
      Allows the System to be used in a for-each statement.
      Methods in ecs with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Engine.addEntity​(Entity e)
      Adds an Entity to the Engine.
      void System.onEntityAdded​(Entity e)
      Callback that gets called each time an Entity gets added to the System.
      void System.onEntityRemoved​(Entity e)
      Callback that gets called each time an Entity gets removed from the System.
      int System.priority​(Entity e)
      This method allows to compare Entities to process them in a specified order.
